welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Balikumbat, a charming city nestled between two rivers in the heart of Cameroon. Known for its vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bamenda Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dschang Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bamenda Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bamenda Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bafoussam Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bafoussam Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
